channel.title: How do i make it so that if you finish a quest you cant use the item on object
channel.description: Okay well I'm making a custom quest and I don't want people finishing it then going back and getting the itema dn then getting the reward again so how do I make it so that when you finish the quest you can't do that anymore?

item.title: How do i make it so that if you finish a quest you cant use the item on object
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

For each action that a player completes for the quest, the quest “progress number” should increase.

For example, after the first action is completed, q1 == 1.

Do the rest yourself.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it so that if you finish a quest you cant use the item on object
